app.components.navbar.cookies: By continuing your navigation, you accept the use of cookies. If you delete or disable our cookies, you may experience interruptions or problems accessing the site
app.pages.services.title: My custom web and mobile development services
app.pages.services.description: Whatever your needs, I offer a tailor-made service to carry out your project. From consulting to realizing a project from A to Z, we will use the best technologies. I work on technologies like VueJS and NuxtJS to create a powerful website that is perfectly referenced by search engines.
app.pages.services.contact_form.title: Contact me and ask for a free quote
app.components.services.list.title: Consulting, website, web app dynamic or mobile app, enjoy a tailor-made service
app.components.services.static.title: Static web site
app.components.services.static.descripti: This type of service will be perfect for a “showcase“ site. For marketing projects aimed at describing a service, a brand or a personal website that could be a portofolio or a CV.
app.components.services.dynamic.title: Dynamic web app
app.components.services.dynamic.descript: Development of powerful websites coupled with an API and a database. For example, your users can create an account, have a dedicated management area, book goods or services, etc.
app.components.services.mobile.title: Mobile app
app.components.services.mobile.descripti: Realizations of Android and iOS mobile applications with technologies like ReactNative or VueNative. Ability to develop an API that will discuss with the application.
app.components.services.responsive.title: Responsive web site
app.components.services.responsive.descr: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
app.components.services.consulting.title: Consulting
app.components.services.consulting.descr: I would intervene on your existing stack to perform any task. Project creation, feature creation, performance optimization, SEO audit or refactoring architecture or code.
app.components.services.seo.title: SEO
app.components.services.seo.description: Many rules are to be followed to optimize the natural referencing in order to be perfectly visible by search engines
app.pages.open_source.title: My open-source projects
app.pages.open_source.description: Contributing to the open-source ecosystem makes it possible to test new technologies but also to take advantage of the latest innovations to as many users as possible
app.components.open_source_projets.title: my open-source projects
app.components.open_source_projets.maz_u: A library of UI components and a CSS framework for Vue.js and Nuxt.js. It combines many intuitive and pretty components to build all your interfaces.
app.components.open_source_projets.smart: An intelligent interface for displaying a list of data and performing filters, sorting and searching on it. Also to display the details of the data.
app.components.open_source_projets.date_: A VueJS component to select dates & times ('date range' mode available)
app.components.open_source_projets.phone: A nice text input to format and validate phone numbers
app.components.open_source_projets.style: A CSS framework built with Gulp and SASS
app.components.open_source_projets.vue_s: Intelligent and intuitive component select input
app.components.open_source_projets.vue_i: A nice input text & textarea component (error handling, loader, clearable, etc.)
app.components.open_source_projets.movin: Give movement to your markers. MovingMarker is a plugin, an extension for view2-leaflet
app.pages.contact.title: Request contact
app.pages.contact.description: Tell me about your projects and your needs, I will answer all your questions. Ability to make a quote for free.

app.pages.contact.form.phone_input.label: Phone number
app.pages.contact.dialogs.title: confirmation

app.components.sections.contact.title: tell me about your project
app.components.sections.profile.about_me: I've always been passionate about the web industry, I'm a self-taught developer
my professional and personal experiences allow me to be today a freelance Javascript developer, specialized in Front-End with VueJS.
app.components.sections.services.title: My services at your disposal
app.components.sections.skills.title: Skills
Realization in NodeJS (ExpressJS) of REST API connected to a database
app.components.sections.skills.front_end: Latest generation, high performance interfaces, SEO friendly and reusable components
app.components.sections.skills.nuxt.desc: With NuxtJS, Server Side Rendering enables optimal performance and optimized SEO
app.components.sections.skills.mobile.de: Technologies like ReactNative or VueNative allow you to develop applications
app.components.sections.skills.seo.label: SEO
app.components.sections.skills.seo.descr: It is crucial for a site to have a good SEO. Many rules must be respected

app.components.sections.skills.css.descr: These technologies make it possible to create responsive, intelligent, pretty and functional interfaces
app.components.sections.skills.graphic.d: Working effectively with designers requires skills on PhotoShop and Illustrator
